title: Amway
summary: Amway (short for "American Way") is an American multi-level marketing (MLM) company that sells health, beauty, and home care products.[4][5][6] The company was founded in 1959 by Jay Van Andel and Richard DeVos and is based in Ada, Michigan.[7][3] Amway and its sister companies under Alticor reported sales of $8.4 billion in 2019.[1][3] It conducts business through a number of affiliated companies in more than a hundred countries and territories.
